data.title: Drew Sidora - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Drew Sidora: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actress who played supporting roles in Step Up, Wild Hogs, and White Chicks. She also played a version of herself in The Game and appeared in That's So Raven. In 2017, she had a small role in the major feature film Sleepless.

Before Fame

She made her acting debut at age ten in the 1995 TV movie Divas.

Trivia

She played the role of Sky in a 2013 television mini-series entitled JD Lawrence's Community Service. In 2020, she joined the cast of The Real Housewives of Atlanta.

Family Life

She gave birth to her first son, Josiah, on May 21, 2011. She then married Ralph Pittman Jr. and had her second son, Machai, in 2015. Her daughter, Aniya Grace, was born on Valentine's Day 2018.

Associated With
